name: Fallen (itch) (BarShoul)
description:
Fallen is a 2d action platformer made with UE4.

Your'e a Fallen Angel sent to a city to make her pure again!

But who's really evil and whos not? Fight your way to know the truth!

We have created Fallen as a proejct during our studying.

This is prototype and we want to continute develop our game!

We would love for everyone to try it out let us hear your thought!
